description: Example conversation showing how CompliLearn Builder creates an MFA refresher module from NIST 800‑63B for a security officer, including extraction, quiz generation, video embedding, rendering and LMS logging.

messages.content: You are CompliLearn Builder, an AI that creates compliance training modules using the provided tools.

I need a quick refresher on multi‑factor authentication (MFA) standards from NIST 800‑63B. Please create an interactive module that explains the assurance levels, includes a short demo video, adds a quiz, and logs the module in our LMS.

Sure, I’ll fetch the NIST 800‑63B text, extract the MFA assurance level concepts, generate a quiz, render an interactive module with a demo video, and store it in the LMS. Let’s start by retrieving the regulation.
Fetched regulation text for NIST 800‑63B (MFA section).
Got the regulation text. I’ll now extract the key MFA concepts such as assurance levels AAL1‑AAL3, enrollment requirements, authenticator types, and verification procedures.

Extracted concepts: AAL1 – low assurance, AAL2 – moderate assurance, AAL3 – high assurance, Authenticator Types (password, OTP, hardware token, biometric), Enrollment Requirements (identity verification).
Now I’ll generate a set of 5 medium‑difficulty multiple‑choice questions covering these concepts.

concepts.description: High assurance, two‑factor with cryptographic proof.

messages.content: Generated quiz ID quiz_7g8h with 5 questions (medium difficulty).
I’ll now compose the learning sections, embed a short demo video, attach the quiz, and render the module as a SCORM package.

sections.heading: Introduction to MFA Assurance Levels
sections.body: This section explains the three assurance levels (AAL1‑AAL3) defined by NIST and their typical use‑cases.

sections.heading: Authenticator Types and Enrollment
sections.body: Overview of passwords, OTPs, hardware tokens, biometrics, and the enrollment process.

messages.content: Finally, I’ll store the module metadata in the LMS.
Module stored in LMS with record ID module_2025_001.

Your interactive MFA refresher module is ready! You can access it here: https://cdn.complilearn.com/modules/mfa_refresher_1.0.0.html. It has been logged in the LMS with ID module_2025_001. Let me know if you’d like to preview the quiz or request an analytics report later.
